title: Millennials Team Up to Fulfill the Dream of Homeownership
sub_head: Burdened by debt and facing soaring home prices, first-time home buyers are pooling their finances with partners, friends or roommates
body:
Six months into the pandemic, Veronica Vest was having a serious home-buying urge.
Ms. Vest, a 27-year-old project engineer, was tired of having to share a building with others, sick of paying rent and building no home equityâ€”and dreaming of stretching her legs in her very own backyard.
